channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NV
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NV

item.title: Report X-2025011337
item.description:
Report X-2025011337

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-04T06:26:27+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-24
  • City: RENO
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Undeclared DG. NO RELEASE. SHIPMENT WAS DISCOVERED BY THE DRIVER WHO HEARD A RATTLING NOISE COMING FROM THE BOX. 1 fiberboard box labeled "Customer:AMAZON, part#Yellow &Black touch up paint, QTY: 1 of each, Date 1/23/25, DIM 9x6x3, 2 lbs,shipped by: Ryan D." **Inner contents: 2 aerosol cans 1. SPRAY MAX , FILL CLEAN 3682071, 7.5 OZ 2. CARDINAL A-4101-BK01 BLACK SEMI GLOSS ACRYLIC ENAMEL AEROSOL , 12 OZ SHIPMENT IS BEING HELD FOR FAA INVESTIGATION.
